Bio

I'm Linhong Dai, and I'm currently a student and teaching assistant at Northeastern University Khoury College, starting September 2021.
I earned my bachelor's degree in Accounting before joining Northeastern. Over the past two years, I've dedicated myself to a range of related courses like OOD, Algorithm and Foundations of AI, and gained practical experience during a summer project with AwanTunai.
I'm enthusiastic about my ongoing journey at Northeastern and the opportunities it continues to provide.
